content: LONDON  Nov 15 Hedge funds bought reinsurance stocks in the third quarter after prices tumbled on widespread losses after multiple hurricanes in North America  filings showed on Wednesday.
name: XL Group Ltd
title: Hedge funds bet on reinsurance recovery

content: Insurer XL Group Ltd  said on Tuesday it would move its European Union insurance company from Britain to Ireland in 2018 after Britons voted to leave the bloc last year.
name: XL Group Ltd
title: Insurer XL Group to move EU unit to Ireland from Britain

content: Sept 19 Insurer XL Group Ltd said on Tuesday it would move its European Union insurance company from Britain to Ireland in 2018 after Britons voted to leave the bloc last year.
name: XL Group Ltd
title: UPDATE 1-Insurer XL Group to move EU unit to Ireland from Britain

content: * Says plans to move its principal EU insurance company  XL Insurance Company SE from UK to Ireland in 2018 in response to Brexit
name: XL Group Ltd
title: BRIEF-XL Group to move XL Insurance Company SE to Ireland

content: NEW YORK Shares of insurer and reinsurer XL Group  could rise over 25 percent in the next year or so  partly since share repurchases will support the company's stock price  U.S. weekly investment publication Barron's said in its Dec. 14 edition.
name: XL Group Ltd
title: XL Group shares could rise more than 25 percent in next year: Barron's
